main event: An observer sighted a bluish light in the northeast for about one second while blending with the sky in Smithtown, New York.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on April 21, 1968, at approximately 9:10 A.M.,The observation lasted for 5 seconds,The object was observed to have no physical evidence,The course of the object was determined to be straight,The conclusion was that it was a probable astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: The observer reported the object blended with the sky and was only visible for a short duration.
